Ringi 35

description.en: Examination with special questions about Wellness and Spa Service Design and Management.
description.et: Töö erialaste küsimustega heaolu- ja spaateenuste disainist ja juhtimisest.

objectives.en: During master's exam the student proves his/her special knowledge acquired by the student throughout the Curriculum.
objectives.et: Magistrieksami käigus tõendab üliõpilane oma õppekava läbimisel omandatud erialaseid teadmisi.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has passed the exam:
1) acquires deep knowledge in the field of spa service design and management;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) omab süvendatud teadmisi heaolu- ja spaateenuste disaini ja juhtimise valdkonnas;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) can formulate and analyse aspects of spa service design and management;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab interpreteerida ja analüüsida heaolu- ja spaatenuste disaini ja juhtimise erinevaid aspekte;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows contemporary theories and developmental trends of spa service design and management;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) tunneb heaolu- ja spaateenuste disaini ja juhtimise valdkonna teooriaid ja arengusuundi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is ablo to express and give reasons fot his/her opinion.
learning_outcomes.et: 4) oskab väljendada ja põhjendada oma seisukohti.

notes.en:
Target group Wellspa2.
The Master's exam is oral and can be taken online. You can find the questions for preparation in Moodle.
notes.et:
Sihtrühm Wellspa2.
Eksam on suuline ja tudeng võib osaleda veebis.
Kõik teemad on Moodle kursusel.

grade_evaluation.en: The student chooses two exam papers at random and must answer to all the questions on the papers. After the student has given their answers, the grade can be calculated based on the answers to all questions.
grade_evaluation.et: The student chooses two exam papers at random and must answer to all the questions on the papers. After the student has given their answers, the grade can be calculated based on the answers to all questions.

debt_elimination.en: The student can retake the final exam in the next academic year.
debt_elimination.et: The student can retake the final exam in the next academic year.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

results_available_from.en: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system on the same day after the final evaluation.
results_available_from.et: The evaluation results are entered into the learning information system on the same day after the final evaluation.
